name: Save the Noodles
description:
i Noodle boy the last noodle left  behind after a game developer hungry for lunch goes to cook up my fellow noodles but i fell out of the packet and survived!

here are a list of devs i think  were involved in this scheme against me

Professor Plow  this guy made music must have something to do with it making the music -https://twitter.com/Justinomvp

 Zldfn101  that art making guy https://itch.io/profile/zldfn101.

temposparkz must of created and programed the whole thing but  snice there was another programmer Anumania must of helped too anyone of these people could of started the whole thing.

 i best save my fellow Noodles  quick with the help of awsd!!!!
